title: Construction and Handyman Services
text:
Interior Renovations



We offer a wide range of interior renovation services including bathroom and kitchen remodeling, basement finishing and much more. Our attention to detail is what transforms your house into a home!



























Remodeling—Kitchen and Bath


Are you outgrowing the space in your home or simply want to increase the value? Do you have unfinished basement space? If your answer is yes to either of these questions, give us a call and we can help you plan your space, add egress windows if necessary, and finish your space. We will handle all the required permits and inspections, making the process stress-free for you as the homeowner.







Basement Finishing


From basic necessities to the most elaborate layouts, we can transform your bathroom or kitchen into a getaway.













  Contact us now    for a free estimate on your project!

title: Construction and Handyman Services
text:
Equipment Services



Need equipment to finish your project? With competitive pricing, our equipment can help you get the job done, and done right!



























Bobcat Services


With our tracked skid steer, we can handle projects such as rough grading, material spreading, creating gravel pads for sheds, gravel driveway topping, and post hole digging.








  Contact us now    for more details, or for a quote on your project!

title: Construction and Handyman Services
text:
Construction and Handyman Services  Pardeeville, WI














Molitor Construction is a licensed and insured general contractor in Pardeeville, WI. We specialize in decks and outdoor spaces, but also offer multiple interior construction and remodeling services. We serve Columbia and Dane Counties and surrounding areas. Follow along or get in touch with us on our contact page!

title: Construction and Handyman Services
text:
Decks, Pergolas, and Outdoor Structures



Outdoor space improvements not only give you a relaxing spot to enjoy a summer evening, but are one of the most affordable-per-square-foot ways to increase your home’s curb appeal and value.



























Existing Structures


Have an old deck that needs a makeover? Let us refresh your old deck with PVC decking, which will require almost no maintenance and far outlast your outdated wood deck. Replacing existing railings with a metal post and cable system, glass panels, or decorative steel are great ways to add flare to an existing deck.







New Structures


We can help you design a brand new deck, pergola or other patio structures that will fit your specific needs.













  Contact us now    and let us know how we can bring your dreams to life!
